name: 郭俊宏
objective:
探討有關無機物質的化學性質、原子結構及化學反應。討論在材料及礦物上之應用。
Chemical properties, atomic structure and chemical reactions of inorganic chemicals will be discussed. Their applications to material science and minerals will be discussed too.
